mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM csat_qna cq, csat_student cs, (SELECT cq.qna_seq,COUNT(cqa.content) AS count_qna_answer FROM csat_qna cq LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_qna_answer cqa ON cq.qna_seq = cqa.qna_seq GROUP BY cq.qna_seq) cqa WHERE cq.student_seq = cs.student_seq AND cq.qna_seq = cqa.qna_seq AND (cs.student_id like IF(#{search} = '', '%%', #{search, typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.AES256TypeHandler}) OR cs.nickname like IF(#{search} = '', '%%', #{search, typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.AES256TypeHandler})) AND IF(#{countQnaAnswer} = 2, cqa.count_qna_answer = 1 OR cqa.count_qna_answer = 0, cqa.count_qna_answer = #{countQnaAnswer})

SELECT cq.qna_seq as qna_seq,cs.student_id as student_id, cs.nickname as nickname,cqc.content as content,cq.title, DATE_FORMAT(cq.write_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as write_date,cq.use_yn, cqa.count_qna_answer as count_qna_answer FROM csat_qna cq,csat_qna_content cqc,csat_student cs, (SELECT cq.qna_seq,COUNT(cqa.content) AS count_qna_answer FROM csat_qna cq LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_qna_answer cqa ON cq.qna_seq = cqa.qna_seq GROUP BY cq.qna_seq) cqa WHERE cq.qna_seq = cqc.qna_seq AND cq.qna_seq = cqa.qna_seq AND cq.student_seq = cs.student_seq AND IF(#{countQnaAnswer} = 2, cqa.count_qna_answer = 1 OR cqa.count_qna_answer = 0, cqa.count_qna_answer = #{countQnaAnswer}) AND (cs.student_id like IF(#{search} = '', '%%', #{search, typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.AES256TypeHandler}) OR cs.nickname like IF(#{search} = '', '%%', #{search, typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.AES256TypeHandler})) GROUP BY cq.qna_seq ORDER BY cq.qna_seq desc LIMIT #{pageNumber}, 10
SELECT cq.qna_seq as qna_seq, cq.title as title,cq.write_date as write_date FROM csat_qna cq WHERE cq.student_seq = #{studentSequence} AND cq.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY cq.qna_seq desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO csat_qna(qna_seq, student_seq, title, write_date, use_yn, user_agent, session_id, ip) VALUES (#{qnaSequence}, #{studentSequence}, #{title}, NOW(3),'Y', #{userAgent}, #{sessionId}, #{ip})
